  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(CartesianRectangle bounds)
      Method called to initialize index after configuration has been read.

    • initialize

      protected abstract void initialize()

    • getNumberOfVehicles

      public int getNumberOfVehicles()
      Returns the number of indexed vehicles.
      Returns:
      the number of vehicles

    • getVehiclesInRange

      public abstract List<VehicleObject> getVehiclesInRange(PerceptionModel perceptionModel)
      Queries the PerceptionIndex and returns all vehicles inside the PerceptionModel.

    • onVehicleAdded

      protected abstract void onVehicleAdded(VehicleObject vehicleObject)
      Abstract method to be implemented by vehicle indexes. Shall include functionality to add a vehicle object to the specific index.
      Parameters:
      vehicleObject - the vehicle to be added

    • onIndexUpdate

      protected abstract void onIndexUpdate()
      Abstract method to be implemented by vehicle indexes. Updates the specific data type implemented by the index.

    • onVehicleRemoved

      protected abstract void onVehicleRemoved(VehicleObject vehicleObject)
      Abstract method to be implemented by vehicle indexes. Shall include functionality to remove a vehicle object from the specific index.
      Parameters:
      vehicleObject - the vehicle to be removed

    • registerVehicleType

      public void registerVehicleType(String vehicleId, VehicleType vehicleType)
      Registers a vehicle and stores its corresponding vehicle type by name. This is required to extract vehicle dimensions.
      Parameters:
      vehicleId - id of the vehicle to register
      vehicleType - the vehicle type of the vehicle

    • removeVehicles

      public void removeVehicles(Iterable<String> vehiclesToRemove)
      Remove all vehicles from the VehicleIndex by a list of vehicle ids. When vehicles are removed from simulation we can remove the cached VehicleType.
      Parameters:
      vehiclesToRemove - the list of vehicles to remove from the index

    • updateVehicles

      public void updateVehicles(Iterable<VehicleData> vehiclesToUpdate)
      Updates the PerceptionIndex with a list of VehicleData objects.
      Parameters:
      vehiclesToUpdate - the list of vehicles to add or update in the index
